title: Extend Towns Module UI to All Users

requirements.text: Update MyTownsPage component to display the same towns interface for all authenticated users, removing any admin-only conditional rendering or access checks that currently restrict the UI to admin users only

quotes: Remove admin-only checks so ALL users see this interface

acceptanceCriteria: All authenticated users can view the MyTownsPage interface
No admin role checks prevent non-admin users from seeing the towns UI
The UI matches exactly what admin users currently see

requirements.text: Display the towns list and default town selection dropdown interface for all users in MyTownsPage, showing the same searchable town selector that admin currently uses, even though the save functionality will not persist data until backend integration is completed in a future phase

quotes: yes show ui even if it does not save yet
Display the towns list and selection UI (even though saving won't work until we connect the backend later)

acceptanceCriteria: All users see a searchable dropdown to select their default town
The dropdown populates with the existing admin-created towns list
UI provides visual feedback when a town is selected (even if not persisted)

constraints: Do not modify any backend code or backend methods
Do not change authentication or authorization logic in the backend
Preserve all existing admin functionality exactly as it currently works
nonGoals: Backend integration for saving user default town selections
Removing favorites functionality (addressed in future phase)
